modules.description: Provides functions to locate the minimum and maximum of real-valued functions using numerical methods. Operates on functions with the type float → float and returns optimized float values. Used for optimization tasks in mathematical modeling and algorithm development.

Provides Brent's method and golden section search for finding maximum points of a real-valued function over an interval. Operates on float functions and interval bounds to return the maximum value and its location. Used for optimizing unimodal functions in numerical analysis and scientific computing.

Provides Brent's method and golden section search for finding minima of real-valued functions. Operates on float functions and intervals defined by three points. Used to locate minima in optimization problems where function evaluations are expensive or noisy.
